00018 /*
00019  * TBB_Pipeline.h
00020  *

00022  *  Created on: 04-Jan-2011

00025 
00026 #ifndef TBB_PIPELINE_H_
00027 #define TBB_PIPELINE_H_
00028 
00029 #include "Pipeline.h"
00030 #include "tbb/task_scheduler_init.h"
00031 #include "tbb/pipeline.h"
00032 #include "Model_Refiner.h"
00033 
00034 using namespace tbb;
00035 
00036 //!An implementation of the Pipeline interface using
00037 //!Intel's Threading Building Blocks.
00038 /**
00039  * TBB::filter is the basic unit of computation and TBB::Pipeline
00040  * puts the filters together.
00041  *
00042  * What filters exist in a pipeline and how the pipeline
00043  * is executed is implemented via an Execution Strategy
00044  *
00045  * Calling each of the add methods adds that particular
00046  * filter to the pipeline
00047  */
00048 class TBB_Pipeline: public Pipeline {
00049 public:
00050     TBB_Pipeline(Model_Refiner&);
00051     virtual ~TBB_Pipeline();
00052     void init();
00053     void add_reader();
00054     void add_sampler();
00055     void add_updater();
00056     void add_optimizer();
00057     void add_eval();
00058     void add_writer();
00059     void add_tester();
00060     void clear();
00061     void destroy();
00062     void run();
00063 
00064     Model_Refiner& get_refiner();
00065     double get_eval();
00066 
00067 protected:
00068     task_scheduler_init _init;
00069     tbb::pipeline* _pipeline;
00070     Model_Refiner& _refiner;
00071 
00072     filter *_reader, *_sampler, *_updater, *_optimizer, *_eval, *_writer,
00073             *_tester;
00074 };
00075 
00076 #endif /* TBB_PIPELINE_H_ */
